Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits advertising for certain foods from being shown on television during certain hours
Summary: Prohibits advertising for certain junk foods from being shown on television between the hours of six A.M. and nine P.M.
LawCode: Add ยง396-bbb, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting advertising for certain foods from being shown on television during certain hours
